value:
My arm bears a mark known as the
Exalt's Brand. When it appeared, my
mother both laughed and sobbed...$k$pSimultaneously. For a whole hour! It
was peculiar...but I'll never forget the
look upon her face.

I could not protect a single soul in the
far-flung future from which I hail. But
I've vowed that will be my last failure.

Accept my thanks for your hard work.
Even when simply running patrols,
you're a vision of inspiration and awe!$k$pYour hood fluttering in the wind, your
mighty hands clutching a divine
weapon... It gets my blood pumping!

Hey, let's think up some special
technique names! Shouting as you
summon is sure to improve results!

I was just about to make a new entry
in the Manual of Justice. But don't
you even think about peeking!$k$pThe legendary pages contained within
are far more than your mortal eyes
could handle.

You're $Nu? I
have braved the abyss to deliver unto
you a most sacred message!$k$pOh, uh... It's
from $Nf.

A mere drop in a bucket already
overflowing with greatness!

Keep your distance, friends. I
cannot control my true power!

What?! Some sinister forces
conspire to impede my growth!

This feeling... Have you granted
me new power?! I shall call it...

Chosen warrior of hope from a dire
future...I am Owain Dark! And with
the full force of my power, I—$k$pEr, huh? No time for that? Oh, um...
I'm Lissa's son from the future. Nice
to meet you.

You've done well to temper my
strength, producing something
truly formidable, friend.$k$pOr shall I call you...Master?!$k$pNot only have you enlisted the aid of
a champion such as myself, but you
have given me power without limit.$k$pYet I know that if I do not appeal to
your scrupulous and iron will, then...$k$pHuh? Why are you backing away
from me? Wait, wait, come back,
$Nu! Please!$k$pI shall—I mean, I will—speak more
plainly. Promise! I'm just glad you've
taken me under your wing is all.$k$pI'm really grateful for all you've done.
It's because of you I've grown so
strong and remained safe in battle.$k$pSomeday I'll become a true hero of
legend... And even then, I'll continue
to stand by your side!
せやっ！
はあっ！
ぐあっ！
That's not enough to take me down!
Sword hand...hungers!
My ultimate technique!
Bite, Missiletainn!
Sacred Stones Strike!
Couldn't...save anyone...
Heehee
S-stay back, friend...! I can't...control...my power...!
Ahh, I see you too bear the aura of a chosen one! We are kindred spirits, you and I.
The blood of heroes courses through our veins! It draws us together, binding us to one another in— Hey, come back! I didn't finish my speech...

Ah, if it isn't the Hero Champion! Brave Master? No, Brave Champion! Wait, the Daring Hero! Oh, I've got it! The Hero Champion! Wait, did I say that one already? The Champion of Daring...Heroes! The Heroic Brave! The Master of Heroes! The...
I've arrived somewhere other than Ylisse?! I couldn't concoct a more devious plot twist if I tried.
Mother... Father... Just you watch. I will save the world. I'll save everyone...
A dark hero such as myself is pretty in-demand... Well, you did go through the trouble to summon me. You may share in my boundless strength!
Hoy there!
Power...overflowing!
A divine request?!
